In the event of any inconsistency between the Sinhala and Tamil texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
Judicature (Amendment) Act, No. 34 of 2022
[Certified on 17th of November, 2022]
an acT To amenD The juDicaTure acT, no. 2 of 1978
BE it enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka as follows: -

1. 
(1)  This Act may be cited as the Judicature (Amendment) Act, No. 34 of 2022.
(2)   The provisions of this Act shall come into operation on such date or dates as the Minister may appoint by Order published
in the Gazette.
(3)   Different dates may be appointed for bringing into operation different provisions of this Act.
2.   Section 2 of the Judicature Act, No. 2 of 1978, (hereinafter referred to as the “principal enactment”) is hereby repealed and
the following section is substituted therefor :-
2.   The Courts of First Instance for the administration of justice in the Republic of Sri Lanka shall be-
